channel.title: Need Help on Arena bloodlines
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need Help on Arena bloodlines" - Arena problem

item.title: Re: Need Help on Arena bloodlines
item.content:encoded: Yes. You can get one arena power per season and cannot get two of the same power.

item.title: Re: Need Help on Arena bloodlines
item.content:encoded:
Ohh… so it is impossible to have 2 different powers on season 1 from what i infer right?

cuz i am legacy and i am on season 1 now… i got the item jazz hands… This means that the only way to have 2 powers is season 2+

item.title: Re: Need Help on Arena bloodlines
item.content:encoded: The arena powers are items. You should have an item (Eye of the Tiger, X-Ray Specs, etc) in your inventory after winning 10 matches on that day. It doesn't count as a bloodline for things like Sannin.

item.title: Need Help on Arena bloodlines
item.content:encoded:
Well currently I am season 1 and i won 10 fights yesterday..

However when i logged in today i do not see an extra bloodline….

Does this mean i cannot get another bloodline during first season?

So does this mean the point in playin arena on first season is to win 15 matches for the item? ( it's quite hard) >.<

Thanks for reading and haf fun =)
